dt: {bc}a plant hormone C{inf}15{/inf}H{inf}20{/inf}O{inf}4{/inf} that is a sesquiterpene widespread in nature and that typically promotes leaf abscission and dormancy and has an inhibitory effect on cell elongation

shortdef: a plant hormone C15H20O4 that is a sesquiterpene widespread in nature and that typically promotes leaf abscission and dormancy and has an inhibitory effect on cell elongation
